entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Resolution
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Resolution Airport 9:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -33.2°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
